## Source: ossf-package-analysis (86fad9166303d847c44fd5532ddf9f11a1b00f4d412bdde3435415be2bdd4b5e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@grafanacloud/test-utils' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
